snippet: French fashion house Christian Dior is seeing blue for women's wardrobes next winter, with artistic director Maria Grazia Chiuri turning to one of the preferred colors of the luxury label's founding designer for her latest collection....

headline.main: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional

lead_paragraph: French fashion house Christian Dior is seeing blue for women's wardrobes next winter, with artistic director Maria Grazia Chiuri turning to one of the preferred colors of the luxury label's founding designer for her latest collection.
